query.statement: SELECT T.CODE, T.CODE_NAME, T.LIFNR, ( SELECT VALUE(X.PCNT,0.0) AS PCNT FROM SAPHEE.ZPSTW0305 AS X WHERE T.MANDT = X.MANDT AND T.LIFNR = X.LIFNR ) AS PCNT FROM ( SELECT A.MANDT, A.TEMNO AS CODE, A.NAMET AS CODE_NAME, A.LIFNR, A.DELEF, B.DIRECT, B.TYPE, CASE WHEN B.POSIC = 'X' THEN 'X' WHEN B.POSIT = 'X' AND B.DIRECT = 'X' AND B.TYPE = '1' THEN 'X' ELSE '' END CHK FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0002 AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0001 AS B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.LIFNR= B.LIFNR AND A.TEMNO = B.TEMNO AND B.POSIT = 'X' AND B.GBN = 'A' WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR# AND (B.RETID = '' OR B.RETID = '00000000') ) AS T WHERE T.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND T.CHK = 'X' ORDER BY T.CODE_NAME FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
